title: League Client/Launcher will not open PLEASE HELP!
body:
Ok, so i know there have been other threads on this is but those solutions havn't been working for me, i've had league for many months now and i've never had a problem like this, I have an acer notebook, windows 10. Simply i click on league (i have tried running as administrator) and the logo apears, then disapears, the apears with the loading bar, then disapears. I have just un installed and reinstalled and i still can't get in to anything. EXTRA INFORMATION THAT MAY MAKE MY PROBLEM DIFFERENT FROM THE REST. About a week a half a go, my friends wanted me to download a game called "paragon" which needed some other programs to run, they didnt end up working on my computer and turned out to be quite dodgy stating that my computer need to be cleaned and what not, i believe i have uninstalled then but since then my computer has been very slow. P.S also this problem would you usually be fixed once i have restarted my computer serveral times.

-Shacks

replies.body: It sounds like you have some security and OS settings that's preventing your games from launching, so it makes sense that the HRT gave a similar error.  Your best bet is to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to grant permanent access.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0QELPueQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-21T15:11:52.892+0000)
>
> It sounds like you have some security and OS settings that's preventing your games from launching, so it makes sense that the HRT gave a similar error.  Your best bet is to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to grant permanent access.  Let me know if you have any questions!

ahh so i tried all of these suggestions and none of them seemed to work...

Bummer, but thanks for trying all that out!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this with you.  As you've already grabbed the HRT, grab the logs that it scanned for you and attach it to your ticket for context.  We'll reply as soon as we can!
Try Hextech Repair Tool, worked for me
Ahh, First time using the software and said something about "admin Privileges" and the ping test also timed out. so yea,
